Package nodemanager.events

This package handles events, which are used to support undo and redo.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionAddedEvent
    Created when a connection between nodes is added
    ConnectionRemovedEvent
    created when a node connection is broken
    EditEvent
    This serves as the base class for the events used by the program.
    EventLog  
    LabelAddedEvent
    Created whenever a label is added to a node
    LabelRemovedEvent
    Created whenever a label is removed from a node
    MapResizeEvent  
    NodeCreateEvent
    Records when a node was created via the "add a node" button.
    NodeDeleteEvent
    Recorded when a node was deleted via the "delete this node" button I can see this being problematic if it can create multiple nodes with the same ID
    NodeMovedEvent
    Records when a node is moved via the "move this node" button

Package nodemanager.events Description

This package handles events, which are used to support undo and redo. These events should be created, then logged in the NodeManager class when the user alters the Graph data using the GUI.
